com.spectralogic.ds3client.helpers.strategy.transferstrategy

Class FailureEventObserver

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.spectralogic.ds3client.helpers.strategy.transferstrategy.AbstractObserver<FailureEvent>
      • com.spectralogic.ds3client.helpers.strategy.transferstrategy.FailureEventObserver
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Observer<FailureEvent>, UpdateStrategy<FailureEvent>

    public class FailureEventObserver
extends AbstractObserver<FailureEvent>
    This class provides the ability to emit an event when we have encountered an exception during a blob transfer.
